TextView.android:text: “ILLUMINATE” is a cognitive self-analysing application exclusively designed for a student’s career prediction.
“Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.”-Confucius

The level 2 deals with the domain-wise interactive QA . Each answer is fed to the Naïve Bayesian classifier algorithm which serves the purpose of dynamically retrieving the next question from a particular module of difficulty from the database.Based on the answers the result is generated whereby the individual’s expertise on a particular area will clearly be seen and the person’s capability to fit to a particular domain is unveiled thus helping in predicting the candidates’ career path.

This application has two levels of questionnaire rounds based on the user’s input. The level 1 round of questionnaire analyses the general personality of the user. This round helps in evaluating the domain-wise interest of the individual. Based on the analysis of these inputs the level 2 questionnaire is generated.
